alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lexington and central Richland Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arcadia Lakes, or over Dentsville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Killian, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds and West Columbia Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 59 and 78. Interstate 26 between mile markers 104 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
